messages.subject: Meg, Links to free ed
messages.msgSnippet: Meg Sorry it should have looked like this http://free-ed.net/catalog/catmain.asp?newCnum=4&newDnum=0 This is a link to the complete college of early childhood
messages.messageBody:
Meg
Sorry it should have looked like this
http://free-ed.net/catalog/catmain.asp?newCnum=4&newDnum=0
This is a link to the complete college of early childhood education. I am taking this course for
my own personal needs not for credit through any orginization which is why these courses are
perfect up for people like me who have no need of a degree. They have many other courses there
covering a lot of subjects.
Dorinda

> Message: 16
> Date: Tue, 9 Jan 2001 14:29:43 -0800
> From: megates@...
> Subject: methods of learning
>
> These links didn't work for me.
> Mary Ellen
>
> Constructivism ( go to www.free-ed.com colledge of early childhood
> education and look up methods of learning but basically it means to build
> on what you already know!)
>
> Another unschooling theory is Brain Based Learning You can take a course
> on that at
> www.free-ed.com also.
